gen:link.msg:message: `OperatingExpensesOther` SHOULD be equal to + `AccruedOrganizationalCostsForSaleOfRealEstatePortfolio` + `DirectOperationalExpensesOtherExploitationPossession` + `LiveabilityExpenses` + `OrganisationCostsOther` + `RentalAndManagementActivitiesExpenses` + `ServiceContractsExpenses`. | {if
